trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 5 other sightings in Stephenville on or around November 18th 2008
divs: sighting detailson 11\18\08 at about 1900 hours, i was standing in the front yard of a residence on clifton street in stephenville texas. i was standing with two other people. one of the people pointed to an object in the night sky. i looked towards the southwest and observed a circular shaped object that was displaying lights in a circular pattern. the object appeared to be just outside the city limits towards the southwest of town. it appeared to be approximately 1000 feet in altitude. if you imagine a wall clock laying flat on a table. the lights started lighting up at the 12 o'clock position and cycled counter clockwise to the 6 o'clock position. the lights went out and then began on the opposite side at the 12 o'clock position and cycled clockwise to the 6 o'clock position. the lights formed a perfect circular shape. another person i was standing with said a light appeared on top of the craft prior to the lights forming in a circular pattern. i am currently in the law enforcement field and have prior military experience. the lights i observed did not resemble any type of aircraft or flare i have ever seen.
Summary: I observed a circular shaped object in the night sky that displayed lights in a circular pattern.
